page.title: 07POPULATION
page.content: In PORT TALBOT the total population figure is approximately 60,000.Within our area there is a population of 12,500. From our door to door surveys we learn that there is an average of 3.127 people per house. We also learned that there was an average of two children in every house.from the total population of the whole town 4,830 of them are employed in the steelworks.Port Talbot used to be a thriving town but is now disintegrating to a rubbish tip for the unemployed. Many of the families are well established within the community with the majority of them being here 20 years or more.
